column5: Hey guys, I am going through some financial hardhsips and its getting real hard to make ends meet. I currently work full time during the day but I am looking for any parttime job for nights and weekends. Please let me know if you hear anything. I live in the Hamilton area. Thanks so much for any input. Cheers and tightlines

That sucks, I'm sure you've looked into it, but, incase you havn't, kijiji always has random jobs posted, some short term, some long term, but for the most part, part-time, odd jobs .. might help to take a peek
Thanks alot for the heads up Mr Perkins, much appreciated
Thanks to those for the kind PMs so far. Great community this is.
Do you have a car?  Back in my younger days I delivered pizzas and made some pretty good $$$$. Plenty of pizza joints, chianese food, etc in Hammertown.

i was gonna say, delivery jobs are great.  i did it as a second job for far ages actually enjoyed it.  the nice part about it is that most of them pay cash at the end of the night, so its cash money, and being paid nightly really helps with getting through the week.  good luck,  ryan
